contentList.content: The wearer gains an additional bonus action.
<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> that cost an action cost a bonus action instead. This effect can be used once per battle.
During combat, when the creature starts their turn with less than full health, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Increases <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> to 21.
Set yourself on fire to gain Heat. This damage can't be resisted out of combat.
Your and nearby allies' movement speed is increased by [1].
Your and nearby allies' jump distance is tripled.
Thermodynamaxe
*Gauntlets of Frost Giant Strength.*
Gauntlets of Frost Giant Strength
Gauntlets of Frost Giant Strength
Grants an additional 1 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> per level.
Immune to Magic Missile. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by [1].

When you are about to be hit by an enemy, increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1]. You take no damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
During combat, you can spend a War Priest Charge to make a main hand attack as a bonus action.
War Priest Attack (Melee)
War Priest Attack (Ranged)
As a bonus action, make a ranged attack with your equipped weapon.
Improved War Priest

You regain all your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="WarPriestActionPoint">War Priest Charges</LSTag> after a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Casting this spell using a 3rd or 4th level spell slot will increase the bonus to [1], and a 5th or 6th level spell slot will increase it to [2].
Conjure [2] magical berries into your or a companion's inventory. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1]. Berries disappear after Long Rest.
Creates 1 additional berries per level.
Casting this spell using a 5th or 6th level spell slot will increase the bonus to [1].
Pact of the Blade (Strength)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Strength
Pact of the Blade (Dexterity)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Dexterity
Pact of the Blade (Intelligence)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Intelligence
Pact of the Blade (Wisdom)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Wisdom
Pact of the Blade (Constitution)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Constitution
Pact of the Blade (Charisma)
Apply Pact of the Blade status with the following ability score: Charisma
Furious Caster
Your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag> no longer prevents you from casting spells.
Rage Impeded Spellcasting
You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.
Additionally, Sneak Attack can also be used as a reaction on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attacks</LSTag> to add Force damage on hit.
You have honed your body and magic for war. After you cast a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag>, you can make a weapon attack using a bonus action, or vice versa.
War Magic: Bonus Attack

Your next weapon attack costs a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>. This attack can lead up to any <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack(s)</LSTag> you may have.
War Magic: Bonus Cantrip
Your next <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag> costs a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> instead of an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>.
You have used your War Magic for this turn.
Force to be Reckoned With

Embrace Kereska's Force to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Your force spells deal additional Force damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
Using the Force (of Kereska)

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Its force spells deal additional Force damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>.
Resplendent Dawn

Embrace Kereska's Radiance to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Your radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
Basking in Kereska's Radiance

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Its radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target.
Practical Caster Gloves
Finely crafted gloves meant to accommadate all of the most outlandish flourishes and finger tricks of spell casting.
Sacred Ring
A small engraving on the ring reads: "Sometimes that what others see as sacred is really just something as scared as you are."
Sculptor's Gloves
Gloves for when you want to keep your hands clean while you're getting your hands dirty.
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Roahton Mobar, whose stances were broad and strong.

A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Strigga Morkoscavich, whose stances moved fluidly, flawlessly, and who defanged the Serpent one blustery night.
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Kimigha Poji, whose stances were narrow and swift.
The Sturdy Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Dravik Halmoren, whose stances were wide and unyielding.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_BEARS_ENDURANCE">Bear's Endurance</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Saving Throws and
The Cunning Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Vorik Emberhand, whose stances were precice and magical.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FOXS_CUNNING">Fox's Cunning</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Saving Throws and
The Lucid Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Kaelum Fironeth, whose stances were prudent and insightful.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_OWLS_WISDOM">Owl's Wisdom</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Saving Throws and
The Splendid Cloth
A garment worn by one of the monks who fought against Headless Serpent, Secret Venom, a gang in the port city of Nyanzaru. This was worn by Caspian Starfall, whose stances were fabulous and powerful.
You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_EAGLES_SPLENDOR">Eagle's Splendour</LSTag> and increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> score by [1], to a maximum [2].
Saving Throws and Dark Vision
